content: Created a GitHub Actions workflow at `.github/workflows/outputs-artifacts.yml` that runs `scripts/generate_outputs.py` on push/PR, verifies deterministic `/outputs/` generation by hashing outputs across two consecutive runs, enforces a clean git working tree, and uploads the `/outputs/` directory as a build artifact.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('.github/workflows/outputs-artifacts.yml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""name: outputs-artifacts

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - "scripts/generate_outputs.py"
      - "outputs/**"
      - ".github/workflows/outputs-artifacts.yml"
  pull_request:
    paths:
      - "scripts/generate_outputs.py"
      - "outputs/**"
      - ".github/workflows/outputs-artifacts.yml"

permissions:
  contents: read""",
"""jobs:
  generate-and-verify:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Generate /outputs
        run: python scripts/generate_outputs.py

      - name: Verify determinism (repeat + hash compare)
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euo pipefail
          find outputs -type f -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 sha256sum > /tmp/outputs.sha1
          python scripts/generate_outputs.py
          find outputs -type f -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 sha256sum > /tmp/outputs.sha2
          diff -u /tmp/outputs.sha1 /tmp/outputs.sha2

      - name: Ensure no unintended repo changes
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euo pipefail
          git status --porcelain
          test -z "$(git status --porcelain)"

      - name: Upload outputs artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: outputs
          path: outputs/
          if-no-files-found: error
          retention-days: 14"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/outputs-artifacts.yml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a GitHub Actions workflow at `.github/workflows/outputs-artifacts.yml` that runs `scripts/generate_outputs.py` on push/PR, verifies deterministic `/outputs/` generation by hashing outputs across two consecutive runs, enforces a clean git working tree, and uploads the `/outputs/` directory as a build artifact.
